subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jermaine Dye doubled in the go-ahead run in the 10th inning and the Chicago White Sox defeated the Detroit Tigers, 7-5, yesterday for their fourth consecutive victory. The win came less than 24 hours after the visiting White Sox pushed across a run in the seventh against Detroit reliever Jason Grilli and held on for a 5-4 win.
